home.slogan: Creating beautiful experiences, one pixel at a time
home.homeText: As a front-end developer, Miguel has more than 5 years of experience building smooth, accessible, and user-friendly websites and mobile applications. He has a strong background in Javascript,  ReactJS and React Native, and a passion for improving user experience. Miguel has contributed to the development of numerous projects and has demonstrated the ability to work effectively with a variety of technologies, including AJAX, HTML5, CSS3, Typescript and Node JS. He has a proven track record of delivering high-quality results and is always looking for new ways to improve and excel in his work. Miguel is a dedicated and innovative developer who is constantly inspired by the intersection of technology and aesthetics. He strives to create web applications that not only serve a purpose but also delight the user with their design.

about.title: About
about.text: Miguel Rivas is a talented frontend developer with a deep love of art and design. Born in Argentina, Miguel now calls Sweden home, where he lives with his family. Though far from his roots, Miguel's passion for creating beautiful and functional websites and applications remains unwavering. With a keen eye for detail and a love of all things tech, Miguel is always seeking new ways to improve his skills and push the boundaries of what is possible with code. In his free time, he enjoys exploring the latest design trends and indulging his curiosity about the art world, finding inspiration in the beauty and poetry of his surroundings

jobs.name: Front-End
jobs.description: Management and further development of the existing website as well as a project to develop and build a new component library. Implemented server-side rendering (SSR) to improve load times and reduce the amount of data transferred between the server and the client. Utilized code splitting and lazy loading to only load the components and resources that are needed for a particular page, reducing the overall size of the application and improving performance. Optimized images and other media assets to reduce their file size and improve loading times. Used techniques such as minification, compression, and concatenation to reduce the size of the codebase and improve performance.Utilized browser caching and other techniques to reduce the number of requests made to the server and improve the overall speed of the application.

projects.title: Projects
projects.header: The process of creating a project involves identifying the goal and scope, gathering resources and assembling a team, developing a plan, and regularly assessing progress. Once the project is completed, it is important to reflect on the process and evaluate its success. This includes reviewing what worked well, what could have been done differently, and what can be learned from the experience. In conclusion, if you'd like to work together to build a solid process for your project, I'm here to help. Let's chat!

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: Don't hesitate to reach out if you have questions or want to collaborate.
contact.longText: Keeping in touch with people can be incredibly beneficial for a variety of reasons. For starters, staying connected with others allows you to stay up-to-date on their work and projects, which can be especially useful if you're in the same field or have similar interests. It also gives you the opportunity to collaborate on future projects or opportunities, which can help you grow both personally and professionally. Maintaining connections with others can also provide support and encouragement in your endeavors. Whether you're facing challenges in your career or personal life, having a network of people you can turn to for advice or simply to lend an ear can be incredibly valuable. And of course, keeping in touch with others can also be a great way to share resources and advice, whether you're looking for recommendations for a service provider or just want to bounce ideas off someone. In addition to the practical benefits of staying connected with others, keeping in touch with people can also be a great way to build and maintain a strong professional network. Having a diverse network of contacts can open up new doors and opportunities, and staying in touch with people you've worked with in the past can help you stay top-of-mind when those opportunities arise. But beyond the professional benefits, keeping in touch with others can also be simply enjoyable. In short, keeping in touch with others can be incredibly beneficial for both personal and professional reasons. Whether you're looking to collaborate on projects, seek advice or support, do not hesitate to reach out.
